snippet.title: Super Mario and the Crystal Crescents - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Mario and the Crystal Crescents is a 1 world mod of New Super Mario Bros. 2 that I've been working on for the past year or so which will hopefully release later this year.
The music in this trailer was made by @Ri0GenMusic
The mod is heavily inspired by Super Mario Moonlite World which was made by VK.
I've mostly been working on this project on my own, but hus and flizl have also helped me out with a lot of New Super Mario Bros. 2's quirks and some modelling stuff along the way.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Hello everyone, Rimea here! 
On this channel I mainly make videos on modding Mario games such as New Super Mario Bros. U or Mario Kart 8 Deluxe and related topics.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/c/Rimea?sub_confirmation=1
► NSMBWii / NSMBU Modding Discord: https://discord.gg/aZAaXVJ
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/The_Rimea
► "Business" Email: rimeamodding@gmail.com
